summary: Quantumoney.app: Wallet & Identity Infrastructure milestone validated; project entering frontend-only layout adjustment phase with a full visual redesign across all pages.
architectural_notes: Wallet & Identity Infrastructure milestone validated/approved before starting layout work.
Layout corrections are strictly frontend/presentation only: no canister/backend changes, no token minting/transfers/simulations; maintain existing content, navigation, and functionality.
known_issues: Current site pages appear visually mispositioned ('too high/subidas') and need layout redesign for professional, balanced, consistent UI.

existing_features.title: Implement a consistent global layout system that prevents content from appearing too high under the fixed header, by introducing a uniform top offset for page content and consistent vertical rhythm (spacing) across the site, without changing navigation, content, or functionality.

Perform a full visual redesign (spacing, alignment, typography, component layout) for the critical pages: Home, Login entry points (header login button + any auth-required screens), AR page(s), Map page(s), Profile page(s), and Rules page(s), ensuring a cohesive and professional presentation while preserving existing content and interactions.

Unify typography, spacing tokens, and component composition across pages by standardizing headings, body text, max-width containers, and card/badge/button layout rules to eliminate inconsistent margins/paddings and improve readability.

Apply a single cohesive visual theme (colors, typography, layout style) across all pages and components to make the UI feel deliberate and consistent. Keep the existing dark + gold direction but refine it into a polished, editorial 'dark-luxury' system with consistent surfaces, borders, and hover/focus states.

new_feature_requests.summary: Frontend-only full visual redesign across all pages (spacing, alignment, typography, component layout), prioritizing Home, Login, AR, Map, Profile, Rules; keep content/navigation/functionality unchanged
